name: Farewell, Brother
description:
Farewell, Brother is a small game for two players about woodpeckers and sibling rivalry. Climb, dodge and peck your way to victory on an endless tower of blocks. Enjoy!

Art, animation, code, design by Kyle McKernan - kylemmckernan@gmail.com
Ukuleles by DKifer / Drums by Vincent Sermonne

 "This is how all sibling rivalries should be fought."
-Chris Priestman, Kill Screen
